name: Landlorder
description:
"I have a competition in me...I want no one else to succeed." -Landlorder

Buy up the neighborhood before the irresponsible locals can. Rent out property so you can...rent out more property. Who needs a job when you can just get others to give you their paychecks?

Avoid angering the tenants, or giving them too much time to become financially independent.

Respond to their demands...or not.
